author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam incorporates a new bandsaw into his workshop, which requires rethinking and rearranging the placement of many machine tools. It's a day of shop infrastructure upgrades to optimize his flow, but this bandsaw is going to allow him to cut materials he previously wouldn't have attempted on his old machine!

Laguna 14CX metal and woodworking bandsaw: https://amzn.to/3J3NFKM

Shot by Adam Savage and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

title: Why Adam Savage Loves His New Bandsaw!
